comment: The opening is an unusual hybrid of the King's Gambit and Italian Game. This experiment does not succeed, but to refute it the inspired and amazingly vigorous play of the young Pillsbury was required. An amusing fact is that White's last move in this given position has not found its way into modern opening guides... 5...
reasoning: The comment explains the mistake by highlighting that the move was an unconventional combination of two different openings, suggesting that it deviated from established principles, which ultimately led to a loss after a strong response.
